       Comments:                                                       

WinAVI FLV Converter is an easy-to-use software to download/convert FLV video files from Internet (e.g.,video.google.com, kinds of vlogs, and etc.). 

It supports to convert FLV from various video formats like AVI, WMV, RM, RMVB, iPod, MP4, PSP..., and vice versa. Besides, it also supports to download FLV from Internet (building in MS IE) and convert to all popular video formats. It has an unmatchable speed and high quality. 

WinAVI FLV Converter can download / convert / transfer FLV files to local hard drive or portable video device from Internet. Just use this software to get a perfect and professional FLV for the Internet!




* Fast convert AVI to FLV, MPEG to FLV, WMV to FLV and other popular video formats to FLV. 
* Convert FLV to iPod/PSP/MP4 that can be played on general portable video device such as MP4 player. 
* Download and convert FLV files from Internet (building in Microsoft IE). 
* Support batch conversion. 
* World's fastest video conversion speed. 
 
 
* User-friendly interface that is easy to use. 
* Support to adjust volume/brightness/contrast for output files. 
* Support clip/zoom/soften the video. 
* Support audio and video sync function. 
* Support to select video decoder/splitter. Solved the problem on the compatibility between different decoders. 
* Support to adjust many video/audio options for video files. For example, video/audio sample rate, bit rate, video size... 
* Has the option to preview the video in real-time. 
* Has the option to automatically shutdown your computer when the conversion has been completed.
